hours_text:
**Pro Tip:** Check real-time updates on available parking spaces by viewing the [Garage Availability Tool!](https://utdirect.utexas.edu/apps/fasweb/parking/garage-availability/nlogon/)

### Parking Near the Museum

Secure paid parking is available in University garages.

  * **[Brazos Garage](https://maps.app.goo.gl/TZkMbkTZwnQLho3u8)** (210 E Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd.) is the closest parking, located one block from the museum. 
  * **Conference Center Garage** (1900 University Ave.) is two blocks away.
  * **[Trinity Garage](https://maps.app.goo.gl/zsBu1fqHHQWHaeUF9)** (1815 Trinity St.) is three blocks away.

ADA parking and elevator access is available in all University garages.

[View ut garage parking map](https://parking.utexas.edu/maps/visitors)

[Accessible parking & routes](https://blantonmuseum.org/visit/accessibility/)

## UT parking rates apply. Members get $4 all-day parking.

1-2 hours| $6  
---|---  
2-3 hours| $9  
3-4 hours| $12  
4-5 hours| $15  
5-8 hours| $17  
8-24 hours| $18  
  
**Member Parking:** Blanton Members receive $4 all-day discounted parking at University garages, payable at the Blantonâ€™s Check-In.

Please note: the Blanton does not manage the University garages. Parking availability and pricing may vary during large campus events. 

## Parking during UT home football games

The Blanton is open on UT home football game days, but parking is limited. 

The Brazos Garage and Trinity Garage are both closed to museum visitors. The closest and mo...

accessibility_text:
## The Blanton is for everyone. 

##### We recognize the wide-ranging abilities and needs of our visitors and offer services to ensure the museum is accessible to all.

Our team is ready to facilitate your arrival. For questions, specific accommodation needs, and to share feedback, contact our Visitor Services team at [accessibility@blantonmuseum.org](mailto:accessibility@blantonmuseum.org) or [(512) 471-5482](tel:512.471.5482) during museum hours.

* * *

## Drop-Off and Parking

**Visitors may be dropped off and picked up at the Museum Drop-Off on Brazos St**., where there is an accessible route along the south or north side of the Michener Gallery Building. Please call our Visitor Services team if assistance is needed.

**Paid parking is available for persons with disabilities at all University garages.** **[Brazos Garage](https://maps.app.goo.gl/TZkMbkTZwnQLho3u8)** (210 E. Martin Luther King Jr.) is the closest University garage, located one block from the museum. ADA spaces and elevator access are available on the Ground Level (Level G).

[Disability / ADA parking at UT](https://parking.utexas.edu/parking/disability-ada-parking-info)

## Accessible parking on UT home football game days

Brazos Garage and Trinity Garage are both closed to museum visitors on UT home football games. The closest and most affordable parking on game days is across the street at the Bullock State History Museum ($25 for all-day parking). Designated and accessible parking spaces are located nea...
